text:
Teamwire | Full Stack and Frontend Developer | Europe | Full-time | Remote

Teamwire is a secure enterprise messaging app or customers call us simplified a "secure Whatsapp for enterprise". We are currently hiring for the following roles:

-- Full Stack Developer

-- Frontend Developer (AngularJS and RabbitMQ)

-- DevOps Engineer (Linux, Docker, Ansible)

The positions would be based either in Madrid or Prague, or remote work out of Europe would be possible. Further information on the positions can be found here: https://www.teamwire.eu/company/careers/

If you are interested please write to: info@teamwire.eu

Thanks!
